Job Posting:173723 - Position: W26 Co-op Developer, Clients, Front End Technologies 173723 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/02/2025 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 09/22/2025 03:26 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Kinaxis 700 Silver Seven Road Ottawa K2V 1C3 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description About Kinaxis 2026 - Winter W26 Co-op Developer, Clients, Front End Technologies 173723 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 8 or 12 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List In 1984, we started out as a team of three engineers. Today, we have grown to become a global organization with over 2000 employees around the world, with a brand-new HQ based in Kanata North in Ottawa. As one of Canada's Top Employers for Young People (2024), we want to help you take the first step in crafting your career journey. At Kinaxis, we power the world's supply chains to help preserve the planet's resources and enrich the human experience. As a global leader in end-to-end supply chain management, we enable supply chain excellence for all industries, with more than 40,000 users in over 100 countries. We are expanding our team as we continue to innovate and revolutionize how we support our customers. Location This is a hybrid position. You must be in the Ottawa, Canada office, at least three days a week. About the Team Maestro is a world-class, unique technology providing lightning fast calculations and powerful collaboration capabilities via its 1TB memory-based database, always-on analytics, simulation tools, and rich UI. In this role, you will develop web application features using a variety of technologies (TypeScript, React, C#) that will bring the power of Maestro to an expanding user community. This is a full-time, 8 to 12-month position, starting January 2026 and is open only to students in a registered Co-op Program in Ontario. What you will do • Develop high quality code for the Maestro web client and application server • Enhance product quality by fixing bugs, writing tests, and improving product performance • Grow our design system by contributing to our reusable component library • Collaborate with the development, QA, and UX teams in delivering new features Job Requirements What we are looking for • Currently enrolled in, or recently graduated from, a program where software development is the primary focus • Experience building web applications, personal projects on GitHub • Open mindset for learning and improving Strong problem-solving and communication skill • Things that would definitely help • TypeScript, JavaScript, C# • A front end framework like React, Vue, Angular, etc. • Unit testing, end to end testing • Functional programming • CSS, CSS in JS REST APIs • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Co-op Developer, Clients, Front End Technologies in Ottawa, Ontario | Careers at Ottawa Headquarters Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
